level.heading: Potomac water to be furnished to charitable institutions without charge.
CREDIT(S)
level.text: (Feb. 23, 1905, 33 Stat. 742, ch. 742, § 1; repealed by D.C. Law 11-111, title III, § 306 (43 DCR 548), eff. April 18, 1996.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2413.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 306 of D.C. Law 11- 111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
